A

act() - Method in class Bomb
Base acting method for a bomb.
act() - Method in class ClientBomb
Takes care of collision detection for other actors in the grid.
act() - Method in class Defender
No acting is done within this function, just to override base actor behavior (flipping).
act() - Method in class Invader
Prevents flipping behavior because of overriding the actor class.
act() - Method in class InvaderBomb
Takes care of collision detection for other actors in the grid.
act() - Method in class Shield
Prevents flipping behavior from overriding actors.
addHit() - Method in class Shield
Adds a hit to total hit count.
